abstract: Le Figaro reports that Sanofi-Aventis is prepared to bid as much as $76 a share for Genzyme — a big increase from its original $69 a share offer.
snippet: Le Figaro reports that Sanofi-Aventis is prepared to bid as much as $76 a share for Genzyme — a big increase from its original $69 a share offer.
lead_paragraph: 2:42 p.m. | Updated Sanofi-Aventis is prepared to bid as much as $76 per share for Genzyme, the biotech firm it has been trying to acquire by hostile takeover since October, the French newspaper Le Figaro reported Thursday.

headline.main: Sanofi Is Said to Raise Ceiling on Genzyme Bid
